thread.section_title: Hotel Le Littre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not coming back
thread.title_full: Not coming back - Review of Hotel Le Littre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tal D
title: Not coming back
text:
Arrived Monday eve, received a smoking room! Smelled terrible so I've asked to have a non smoking room (unclear why the default was to give me a smoking room on the 7th floor).
The alternative room on the 4th floor was fine until midnight when the power (electricity) went out for some of the rooms including mine.
After understanding that they'll not be able to fix the problem, I've packed my bag using the mobile phone flashlight and moved to another room on the 1st floor.
No queen size bed was available so I've received two twin sized beds in the new room, which according to the hotel was a superior room (maybe the room was a bit larger but the bathroom was smaller, so nothing superior about it).
Last but not least he breakfast is of fine quality but the variety is very small and not worth the additional costs.
This is the first hotel in Paris that I can say I was deeply disappointed with.
